jar.label: Unity P8 Content Web API Version:
jar.name: jace.jar

AccessRole.description: Specialist : Members of this role handle product-specific complaints
AccessRole.name: Specialist

AccessRole.description: Manager : This role is for the manager of the complaint Contact Center workers
AccessRole.name: Manager

AccessRole.description: Investigator : This role performs detailed investigation on complaints when required
AccessRole.name: Investigator

AccessRole.description: Built-in system role for Unity Configuration editors
AccessRole.name: canEditApplicationConfig

AccessRole.description: Built-in system role for Unity System Administrators
AccessRole.name: Unity System Administrators

AccessRole.description: Billing Agent : These workers handle billing-specific complaints
AccessRole.name: BillingAgent

AccessRole.description: Built-in system role for Unity Users. All users granted access to the application should be members of this group
AccessRole.name: Unity Users

AccessRole.description: Contact Center : These workers handle calls and email complaints
AccessRole.name: ContactCenter

AccessRole.description: SalesAgent : This role is for the sales agents who interact with customers for any sales opportunities
AccessRole.name: SalesAgent

AccessRole.description: Built-in system role for Unity Configuration Administrators
AccessRole.name: Unity Configuration Administrators

Property.value: select ISO_COUNTRY_CODE as value, COUNTRY_NAME as name from dbo.TBL_COUNTRY order by COUNTRY_NAME
select INDUSTRY_SEQ as value, INDUSTRY_TYPE as name from DBO.TBL_INDUSTRY order by INDUSTRY_TYPE
select STATE_CODE as value, STATE_NAME as name from dbo.TBL_STATE where ISO_COUNTRY_CODE = '{This.DEEP_Country}'
select id as value, concat(name, ' - ', license_name) as name from form
select f.bureau_id as value, b.name as name from form f join bureau b on f.bureau_id = b.id where f.id={This.EP_FormID}
select id as value, name as name from bureau
select id as value, name as name from section
select program_code as value, description as name from program
select revenue_seq as value, description as name from revenue_code where form_id={This.EP_FormID}
select revenue_seq as value, description as name from revenue_code
select f.bureau_id as value, b.name as name from form f join bureau b on f.bureau_id = b.id where f.id={This.EP_FormID}

Property.Name: Attachments
Property.EmptyText: Select a file to check in...

SecuredValue.Value: SELECT {Macro.ResultProperties}, [Reservation] FROM Document WHERE ({UCM.IN_FOLDER}) AND {Macro.QueryCriterion} AND {Macro.FilterCriterion}

select f.id as id, f.id as form_id, fc.id as form_configuration_id, f.name as form_name, f.bureau_id as bureau_id, f.section_id as section_id, f.license_name as license_name, f.program_code as program_code, f.env_int_type_code as env_int_type_code, f.application_type as application_type, (case p.supervision_flag when 0 then p.reviewers_ldap else p.supervisor_ldap end) as assigned_group, p.supervision_flag as supervision_flag FROM form f join form_configuration fc on f.id = fc.form_id join program p on f.program_code = p.program_code where (current_timestamp >= fc.effective_from or fc.effective_from is null) and (current_timestamp <= fc.effective_to or fc.effective_to is null) AND {Macro.QueryCriterion}

Perspective.title: Connecticut Department of Energy and Environmental Protection Permits and Licenses
Connecticut Department of Energy and Environmental Protection Permits and Licenses

queries.query: select top 1 this\, Id from ChoiceList where DisplayName = ''{0}''
